pages.privacy-policy: GamingGenius Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Information GamingGenius Home About us Services Сontact Privacy Policy GamingGenius is committed to protecting the privacy and confidentiality of our users' personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or interact with our services. We encourage you to read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal information. By accessing or using GamingGenius, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or practices, please contact us. We collect various types of information from users of GamingGenius, including personal information and non-personal information. Personal information may include your name, email address, and payment details when purchasing books. Non-personal information may include demographic information, browser type, and IP address. We collect information directly from you when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or fill out a form. We may also collect information automatically through cookies and similar tracking technologies. The information we collect is used to improve our website and services, personalize your experience, process transactions, and send periodic emails regarding your orders or other products and services. We use the information we collect for various purposes, including to personalize your experience on GamingGenius, improve our website and services, process transactions, and administer contests, promotions, surveys, or other site features. Your information helps us to better respond to your customer service requests and support needs, communicate with you about your orders, send periodic emails regarding your transactions, and administer our affiliate program if applicable. We may also use your information to conduct market research, analyze trends, and gather demographic information for internal use. We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety and confidentiality of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. We use industry-standard encryption technology to protect your sensitive information transmitted online. Your personal information is stored on secure servers and is only accessible by authorized personnel who have special access rights to such systems. All financial transactions are processed through a gateway provider and are not stored or processed on our servers. We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy. We may disclose your information to trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third-party products or services on GamingGenius. These third-party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback about these sites. Third-party links on GamingGenius may include affiliate links that allow us to earn commissions on purchases made through those links. These affiliate relationships do not influence our editorial content or reviews. GamingGenius uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website and gather information about visitors and users. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your web browser (if you allow) that enables the site's or service provider's systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. We use cookies to understand and save your preferences for future visits, keep track of advertisements and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future. GamingGenius complies with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18 without parental consent. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18 without parental consent, we will take steps to delete such information as soon as possible. Parents or guardians who believe that GamingGenius may have collected personal information from a child under the age of 18 without consent can contact us to request the deletion of that information. GamingGenius@gmail.com. GamingGenius complies with the California Online Privacy Protection Act (CalOPPA). We do not distribute your personal information to outside parties without your consent. California residents have the right to request information regarding the disclosure of their personal information to third parties for direct marketing purposes. GamingGenius does not engage in such disclosures. California residents may request a copy of the information we have collected about them, as well as information about the categories of third parties with whom we have shared their personal information for direct marketing purposes, if any. By using GamingGenius, you consent to our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, please do not use GamingGenius. Your continued use of GamingGenius following the posting of changes to this Privacy Policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes. If we decide to change our Privacy Policy, we will update the Privacy Policy modification date below. You can access and update your personal information by logging into your account on GamingGenius. You may also contact us to request access to or correction of any personal information we have about you. We may decline requests that are unreasonably repetitive, require disproportionate technical effort, jeopardize the privacy of others, or are impractical. To protect your privacy and security, we may verify your identity before granting access to your personal information. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We may retain non-personal information indefinitely. If you close your account or request that we delete your information, we may retain and use your information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. We will securely delete or anonymize your personal information when it is no longer needed for the purposes for which it was collected. We may retain aggregated or anonymized data indefinitely for analytical purposes. GamingGenius is hosted in the United States and is intended for users located within the United States. If you are accessing GamingGenius from outside the United States, you consent to the transfer of your information to the United States, where data protection and privacy regulations may differ from those in your country. By using GamingGenius, you acknowledge and agree that your information may be transferred to and processed in the United States. We will take reasonable steps to ensure that your personal information remains protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions about international data transfers, please contact us. GamingGenius@gmail.com. Home About us Services Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer At our casino, security and accountability are top priorities. We protect your data using state-of-the-art encryption technology, guaranteeing the privacy and security of every transaction. © 2024 GamingGenius. All rights reserved.
